content: s medium slipper ws row k1 p1 to end of row * a bit of local history monarch knitting ltd was a 4-storey repeat between * * 5 more times 12 row in spinning and knitting mill which operated in st thomas total or 3 inches ontario from 1908 until the late 1940 s it was the largest toe decreases manufacturer of yarns in canada and the largest employer row 1 rib 7 ssk k1 k2tog rib 5 ssk k1 k2tog of female labour in st thomas in the 1950 s it became rib 7 parkspin a spinning mill with a popular factory outlet in row 2 rib 7 p3 rib 5 1964 earl and lavina shaw whose family founded the p3 rib 7 mary maxim company moved to st thomas to operate parkspin row 3 rib 6 k2tog k1 why do i call these parkspin slippers an early version of ssk rib 3 k2tog k1 ssk this pattern was available at parkspin and was one of my rib 6 21 sts first knitting projects and my first real summer job was working at the big old spinning machines in this mill oh dear i just put myself in a paragraph about local history joan janes knits joaninglisjanes@gmail com 2011-2019
